General.Name: Beijing JIAYU Door Window Curtain
General.Description: Jiayu Holding Co.,Ltd. focuses on providing energy-saving door and window curtain walls in China. The company offers door and window, and curtain wall products. It is involved in the photovoltaic and heat, intelligent equipment, photothermal, and retail businesses. The company was formerly known as Beijing JIAYU Door, Window and Curtain Wall Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
